Key Match Events: Zion Williamson returned to play after missing 27 games with a hamstring injury and scored 22 points in 28 minutes.
The New Orleans Pelicans lost 104-97 to the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Post-Match Reflections: Zion Williamson expressed his love for playing basketball and emphasized working hard despite trade rumors.
Williamson acknowledged the need to quickly get back into playing rhythm for the team's benefit.
